techmeme.title: Q&A with Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis and Google co-founder Sergey Brin on AI frontier models, scaling data centers, reasoning, DeepThink, AGI, and more (Alex Kantrowitz/Big Technology)

Google is using its extensive data on users to give its AI models an advantage over OpenAI and Anthropic, starting with its opt-in Gemini with personalization (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Running app Strava raised new funding at a $2.2B valuation including debt, up from $1.5B after raising $110M in November 2020, and nears $500M in ARR (Ben Glickman/Wall Street Journal)
How SpaceX's Starlink moved quickly to solidify its lead in the satellite internet business, as its competitors face production and launch capacity bottlenecks (Financial Times)
